name: Distress Signal
summary: A space themed looter-shooter bullet hell where you must investigate a distress signal at precisely 1337 astronomical units away from earth. Space is not for the faint hearted.

videos.title: Make an IMPOSSIBLE Game in 1 WEEK (or you can't do that) | Distress Signal (Unity Indie Game Devlog)
